entry.title: First Impressions of Droid Eris
entry.content: I just recently got a new phone, a Droid Eris. So far I’m liking it a lot. The keyboard is surprisingly easy to use. I haven’t gotten around to tethereing the phone yet, but thats my next step. Then I’ll be able to use my computer from the road, something the iPhone didn’t offer me, which is why I went with an Android phone. So here’s hoping!
